mapper.select: select a.userid , bmtid , gpstm , lat , lon , speed , cp , carinfo from gps_info a, ( SELECT userid, max(gpstm) as max_gpstm FROM gps_info -- 테스트를 위한 주석 처리 ( 테스트는 당일 마다 데ㅐ이터를 받아 볼수 없기 때문 ) -- where to_date(gpstm, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') = current_date group by userid ) b, ( select a.userid, cp, carinfo from cp_list a, ( SELECT userid, max(reg_date) as reg_date FROM cp_list group by userid ) b where a.userid = b.userid and a.reg_date = b.reg_date ) c where a.userid = b.userid and a.gpstm = b.max_gpstm and a.userid in (select userid from admin_user_list where adminid in ( select adminid from admin_user_list where adminid = #{userid} or userid = #{userid})) and a.userid = c.userid order by userid
